name: func. Temp
func. RH
Description
info:
## Description
 This group performs two main tasks: 
 - Process and display BME readings.
 - Thermostat control.
 ### User inputs:
    - Thermostat deadband.
    - Thermostat control.
    - BME interval.
    - Trigger BME reading.
    - Switch bolier on/off.
    - Local elevation for Sea Level Pressure.
 
 ## Websocket msg received:
 1. ### Receive BME readings ESP Feedback group.
 2. ### Process and distribute message.
    - BME Readings --> assign topic and apply scale.
    - BME State and "last timer" --> send to ESP Feedbak group.
 4. ### Display BME Readings.
    - BME current values --> gauge.
    - BME historic data --> chart.

## Thermostat control 
- Create context-scope variables for temperature, deadband and setpoint.
- Define Heater output.

name: Description
info:
GPIO Controls:
Switches to control ESP built-in LED and debug mode.
Buttons to command reboot, OTA upgrade, Wifi reset and BME Read
Signals sent via MQTT protocol to ESP device.
The topic is: esp/xxx
The ESP will use the topic to identify the task.
Signals are sent to the "MQTT Send" group to be broadcasted.

name: Description

    - Debug
